page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STUART
page.content: At 7.40am I wake up,have a shower and then eat my breakfast,either a cereral or a cooked meal.I then clean my shoes and pack my bag ready for school.My mum takes my brother and me to school in the car.This is because my brother has difficulties with his hearing and my school has a Partially Hearing Unit.We arrive at 8.40am. School starts at 8.55.I usually have sandwiches for lunch.At 3.30 we leave school.Generally I buy some sweets and then we go home.I go out to play and come in for a meal at 5pm.If it is Friday,I go to a Youth Club near my house.There I play snooker, table tennis and board games.At 9.30pm I go home and go to bed.
